ygData.subject: Psalm of Mystic Shielding
ygData.msgSnippet: Learned something new last night about Psalm of Mystic Shielding.  In addition to the magic resistance buff, it also provides HP regen.  At 50th level, it
ygData.messageBody:
Learned something new last night about Psalm of Mystic Shielding. In
addition to the magic resistance buff, it also provides HP regen. At 50th
level, it added 5 HP per tick. Not certain if it scales with level or not.
The HP regen component of the song is not listed on the EQSongs website.
Not certain if it is listed on Reed's Spreadsheet. Tried to check there but
the link to Reed's spreadhseet isn't working.

BTW has this always been known? Don't recall ever seeing it mentioned here
on the list.

Galtin of E'ci


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
